mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_PARTNERS ( COMPANY, ESTABLISHDT, CEO, COMPANY_TYPE, COMPANY_NUM, COMPANY_REPORT_NUM, COMPANY_SECTOR, COMPANY_CATE, COMPANY_SALES, COMPANY_CAPITAL, COMPANY_MANAGER, COMPANY_TEL, COMPANY_FAX, COMPANY_EMAIL, HOMEPAGE, COMPANY_ADDR, FACTORY_ADDR, COMPANY_PLANT1, COMPANY_PLANT2, COMPANY_PLANT3, COMPANY_PLANT4, EMPLOYEE_COUNT, HACCPYN, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_DESC, COMPANY_DESC, REGDT, MARKETING_AGREE, STORE_AGREE ) VALUES ( #{company}, #{establishdt}, #{ceo}, #{companyType}, #{companyNum}, #{companyReportNum}, #{companySector}, #{companyCate}, #{companySales}, #{companyCapital}, #{companyManager}, #{companyTel}, #{companyFax}, #{companyEmail}, #{homepage}, #{companyAddr}, #{factoryAddr}, #{companyPlant1}, #{companyPlant2}, #{companyPlant3}, #{companyPlant4}, #{employeeCount}, #{haccpYn}, #{productName}, #{productDesc}, #{companyDesc}, NOW(), #{marketing_agree}, #{store_agree} )
